resources.string: This is the welcome screen of the Better With Music app. \nThe user is presented with a small description of the app and invited to choose between the categories of music available by tapping the "Pick and activity!" button

Yes! Scientific studies have shown that performance in any field can be improved when you listen to music.
 
But not just any music. 
 
This app provides you with just the music you need. Just pick an activity and enjoy the benefits of MUSIC!

This screen shows the songs available to aid the study activity. The user should be able to scroll through them or search for a specific song and pick one to play. He should also be able to download / buy new songs from the BWM library

This screen shows the songs available to aid the work activity. The user should be able to scroll through them or search for a specific song and pick one to play. He should also be able to download / buy new songs from the BWM library

This screen shows the songs available to aid the exercise activity. The user should be able to scroll through them or search for a specific song and pick one to play. He should also be able to download / buy new songs from the BWM library

This screen should show the name of the song playing, the time progress bar of the specific song and buttons to allow stopping, playing, skipping within the song and moving to the next song. The END SESSION button should take the user to the activity categories screen in order to pick another type of activity

This screen shows the type of activities the user can choose to improve with music. The user should be able to add his own custom category and choose his own songs either from phone library or to buy online from a bwm specific website
